source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_00<tab>The allied forces at Snowcloak are in danger, and Lord Drillemont would have you assist him in ensuring their safety.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_00<tab>ホワイトブリム前哨地のドリユモンは、冒険者にさらなる協力を求めているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_01<tab>According to Lord Drillemont, it had long been suspected that the heretics used secret tunnels to travel throughout the highlands of Coerthas undetected. In light of the information you overheard, he is convinced that the heretics encamped in Boulder Downs now plan to make use of such tunnels to ambush the allied forces in Snowcloak. He has ordered a contingent of House Durendaire knights to begin searching for the ambushers, but he believes that your presence would do much to bolster their efforts. Travel to Boulder Downs and rendezvous with the House Durendaire knights.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_01<tab>冒険者が持ち帰った情報から、ドリユモンは異端者の別働隊が潜んでいると推測した。スノークローク大氷壁へと向かった神殿騎士団とクリスタルブレイブの捜索部隊が、背後を突かれることがないよう、異端者の別働隊を叩く必要がある。敵別働隊の潜伏先と目される、クルザス中央高地の「巨石の丘」に向かい、ドリユモン配下の騎兵たちと合流しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive in Boulder Downs to discover the knights of House Durendaire slain after what must have been a desperate battle with Iceheart's followers. Before you can take stock of the situation, you find yourself surrounded by the surviving heretics, who are plainly hungry for retribution... Though they fight with the passion of true believers, they are no match for you, and soon they too lie motionless in the snow. What now? For want of a better idea, search the heretics' bodies for anything which might offer some insight into their plans.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_02<tab>巨石の丘では、先行していたドリユモン配下の騎兵たちが既に倒されており、異端者たちの襲撃を受けた。なんとか異端者たちを退けることに成功したので、巨石の丘にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E980A01 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_03<tab>You rifle through a heretic's knapsack and find a curious parchment with dates and times writ upon it. Could it be of significance? Lord Drillemont will know.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_03<tab>異端者が遺した遺留品を調べた。ホワイトブリム前哨地の「ドリユモン」に、入手した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3E01 /var>」を渡して報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_04<tab>Lord Drillemont recognizes the parchment as a timetable of guardsmen's shift changes from the outpost in Snowcloak. With it, the heretics could pass into and out of their tunnels without fear of discovery, and thereby prepare an ambush for the allied forces searching the area. Despite your best efforts, it would seem the Temple Knights and Crystal Braves are still in danger, and Lord Drillemont has no choice but to send reinforcements.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_SEQ_04<tab>ドリユモンに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3E01 /var>を渡した。その結果、羊皮紙は異端疑惑の騎兵の当直表であることが明らかとなった。だが、異端者の別働隊は、どうやらほかにもいるらしい……。
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_TODO_00<tab>デュランデル家の騎兵と合流

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the heretic's parchment to Drillemont.

TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_000<tab>We have long suspected that the heretics use a network of secret tunnels to traverse the highlands undetected... Given what you overheard, I fear that Snowcloak may be riddled with such passageways, and that the heretics in Boulder Downs are planning to use them to take our forces unawares. Needless to say, we cannot allow that to happen.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_000状況を再確認するぞ。
貴公が耳にした言葉から察するに、
異端者の別働隊が、巨石の丘に潜んでいる可能性が高い。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_001<tab>A contingent of House Durendaire knights are on patrol in the area, and I shall order them to begin searching for the heretics at once. But knowing nothing of our enemy's numbers or readiness, I cannot say for sure that they will be sufficient...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_001このまま奴らを放置すれば、スノークローク大氷壁に向かった、
捜索部隊の背後を突かれかねん。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_002<tab>It would put my mind at ease if you would consent to assist my knights with the search. I know they would take courage from the presence of so storied a warrior.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_002……そうか、案外、それが目的なのやもしれんな。
大氷壁の秘密坑道から脱出を試みる一方、
追撃された場合は、別働隊が背後を急襲する……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_003<tab>Pray rendezvous with them at Boulder Downs. If Halone is kind, we may catch these heretics before their plans come to fruition.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_003そうとわかればグズグズしておれん！
我が配下の部隊にも、出撃を命じるゆえ、
貴公も「巨石の丘」に向かい、索敵に協力してくれ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_004<tab>Show them no mercy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The lives of our allies are at stake.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_004徹底的に索敵を行い、
異端者どもの別働隊を見つけ出すぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_010<tab>I implore you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─make haste to Boulder Downs. Rendezvous with my knights and lay low every last heretic you find.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_010グズグズしておれん！
我が配下の部隊にも、出撃を命じるゆえ、
貴公も「巨石の丘」に向かい、索敵に協力してくれ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_011<tab>Every moment spent dawdling is a gift to our enemies─another chance for them to slink into their accursed tunnels and appear at our allies' backs.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_011徹底的に索敵を行い、
異端者どもの別働隊を見つけ出すぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_020<tab>My knights sent no word of your coming, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What has happened? What is that in your hand?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_020戻ったようだな。
さっそくだが、報告を聞かせてくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_030<tab>By the Fury... Those were veterans with years of service!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_030な、なんだと……！？
貴公が「巨石の丘」に辿り着いたときには、
すでに我が配下の兵たちが倒されていただと？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_031<tab>And now they lie dead in the snow. <sigh> Their bodies must be recovered, and─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_031……なんということだ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、貴公が異端者たちを退け、
仇を討ってくれたことだけが救いか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_032<tab>No. No, we have not the men to spare. Not now. Not while Iceheart prepares to summon an abomination.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_032<tab>……ええい、感傷に浸っている場合ではないな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_033<tab>The heretics you dispatched were not of sufficient number to contend with the combined strength of the Temple Knights and the Crystal Braves. There must be others. And I'll wager they are on their way to Snowcloak as we speak.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_033貴公が持ち帰ってくれた、この羊皮紙だが……
ここに記されている数字と文字の羅列は、
「異端疑惑の騎兵」の当直の日時を示しているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_034<tab>To make matters worse, it seems the traitor you followed managed to pass the heretics something of value after all...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_034奴は、スノークローク大氷壁の前に設営された、
調査隊キャンプの護衛を担当していた。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_035<tab>The parchment you recovered is a timetable of the guardsmen's watches at our outpost in Snowcloak. The traitor was stationed there long before he aroused our suspicions. Would that we had caught him sooner!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_035つまり、奴が見張りを行う日は、調査員さえ寝てしまえば、
自由に大氷壁に出入りできたということになる。
……もはや、秘密坑道の存在は確定的だな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_036<tab>With this information, the heretics would know when the watch was weakest. They could use their tunnels with impunity and prepare their ambush...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_036だが、貴公の話を聞くかぎり、
捜索部隊の背後を襲うつもりにしては、兵力が少なすぎる。
ほかの場所にも潜伏している可能性が高いか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_037<tab>The timetable has not changed, you see. Of course, it will be changed <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>, but the heretics may already be in position.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_037よし、これより、デュランデル家の騎兵団の総力を挙げ、
周辺に潜む異端者狩りを行うとしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_038<tab>House Durendaire <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> send reinforcements─even if it means withdrawing knights from the Stone Vigil. I can see no other way to safeguard the lives of our allies.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE407_00074_DRILLEMONT_000_038感謝するぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ！
異端者どもの好きにさせずに済みそうだからな。
